channel.title: Vortex-generator on Jatinder Pal
channel.description: Recent content in Vortex-generator on Jatinder Pal

item.title: Vortex Generator
item.description: Vortex generators have shown promise in reducing, if not completely removing, flow separation due to shock-boundary layer interaction. These devices introduce a set of co-rotating or counter-rotating vortex pairs into the flow, which are considered to make the streamwise velocity profile fuller (near the wall), effectively increasing the ability of the flow to withstand higher adverse pressure gradient without undergoing separation. A sub-class of vortex generators is the ramp-type or wedge-shaped vortex generator (other being vane type) that produces a counter-rotating vortex pair.
